Subject: Chivtron Decisions
Message-ID: <9hei6k+1vjm@...>

MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 824
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: gunthers8@...

Grounded looked to all that was there. "I will start now.  This is 
concerning our biggest security threat right now,no, not Deemos, but 
Trinity.  She must be trained immediatly to know how to fight, and 
take care of herself.  She is being held back and that takes our 
attention in a fight.  Second threat is this Deemos.  Now, Sarge. I 
say our best chance of survival against him and his growing army is a 
surprise attack.  I would like you to devise a team, and I will show 
you my plan.  Now Windlord, Aerotaur, and Axis.  Would you accompany 
to meet with the Cybers.

He opened a commlink to the Cybers.  "This is Grounded, Defense 
Commander of the Chivtron faction.  We would like a meeting with 
you.  I am patching through a point where we shall meet.  (today's 
iceland.)  22-45-78594. Please meet us there."
